name: excalidraw
description: Excalidraw is an open-source virtual whiteboard for hand-drawn style diagrams, sketches, and collaboration. It supports real-time multi-user sessions, exports, and can be embedded or self-hosted as part of documentation or design workflows.

features.title: Hand
features.description: Sketchy diagrams with personality. Unique visual appeal

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Draw together with team members. Shared whiteboard experience

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Save as PNG, SVG, or JSON. Flexible output formats

features.title: Embeddable
features.description: Integrate into docs and websites. Versatile usage

features.title: Infinite Canvas
features.description: Unlimited space for your ideas. Never run out of room

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own whiteboard server. Complete control over diagrams
